1.content: This place wretched of unknown alien like stains from top to bottom. It smelled of last weeks ramen and today's... "exploits". It wasnt really a liveable apartment but it was mine. Rolling over, I grabbed my Monster Energy sticker covered phone and looked at the time. It was 12:43. I groaned and tried thinking of my name. What was it again?
1.title: A filthy domain

11.content:
For an inexplicable reason, I layed upright in my stench filled bed. And with perfect speed and precision pulled out my big iron and put it against my head. 'In this universe, Karen's don't deserve to live.' were my last thoughts before I gunned myself down.

GAME OVER
11.title: Karen

info.brief_description: Now this is COMPLETELY a joke story, enjoy.
info.description: Now this is COMPLETELY a joke story, enjoy. A trip to Lotion&Tissues Co. leads to a series of events that Kyle would have never seen coming.
